name: Run Chicken! v1.6.1
description:
This is a little demo of the game that I am developing inspired by the Freeway game of atari, a lot is missing for it to be finalized but I hope you have fun with this demo.

COMMANDS

Player 1 - AWSD

Player 2 - Arrows
